item.title: 以色列和伊朗继续互相攻击，战事愈演愈烈
item.description: 周一，以色列和伊朗之间的公开敌对行动进入了第四天，没有丝毫缓和的迹象，这加剧了人们对这一石油资源丰富地区爆发更大规模战争的担忧。【原文：Open hostilities between Israel and Iran entered a fourth day on Monday with no sign of easing, stoking fears of a wider war in the oil-rich region.】

item.title: 日本债券混乱预示全球市场波动加剧
item.description: 日本一度沉睡的债券市场重新焕发生机，其波动性在全球范围内引起反响。【原文：Japan’s once-slumbering bond market has roared back to life with a burst of volatility that is echoing around the world.】

item.title: 波动性上升后，日本央行将考虑放缓削减债券购买计划
item.description: 日本央行将考虑是否以更慢的速度缩减债券购买规模，同时维持基准利率不变，债券市场将密切关注这一决定。【原文：The Bank of Japan is set to consider whether to taper its bond purchases at a slower pace while also leaving its benchmark interest rate unchanged, in a decision that will be closely scrutinized by the bond market.】

item.title: 英国立法者抨击不负责任的水务公司领导人
item.description: 英国立法者呼吁对该国的水务部门实行更负责任的所有权，在此之前的几十年里，该国的关键基础设施一直是为了私募股权投资者的利益而运营。【原文：UK lawmakers called for more responsible ownership of the country’s water sector, after decades during which critical infrastructure was run for the benefit of private equity investors.】

item.title: Rightmove 称伦敦房价下调是为了吸引受税收影响的买家
item.description: 据房地产中介称，伦敦的房屋卖家在6月份将要价降低了近7000英镑（约合9481.5美元），以吸引面临更高税收和更多选择的买家。【原文：London home sellers slashed almost £7,000 ($9,481.5) off their asking prices in June to attract buyers facing higher taxes and greater choice, according to real estate agents.】

item.title: 马来西亚石油巨头马来西亚国家石油公司（Petronas）向海外寻求帮助，以降低生产成本
item.description: 马来西亚国有石油天然气公司（Petroliam Nasional Bhd.）正在寻求扩大海外更廉价资产的产量，以努力降低生产成本，控制利润下滑。【原文：Petroliam Nasional Bhd., Malaysia’s state-owned oil and gas company, is looking to expand output from more affordable assets abroad in an effort to cut production costs and rein in declining profits.】

item.title: ASIC 在屡次出现严重失误后开始调查 ASX
item.description: 澳大利亚证券和投资委员会表示，由于屡次出现严重失误，该委员会已开始对 ASX 有限公司展开调查。【原文：The Australian Securities and Investments Commission said it’s started a probe into ASX Ltd. following serious and repeated failures.】

item.title: 中东冲突刺激避险需求，黄金走高
item.description: 周一，黄金升至创纪录水平，因为以色列表示不会放松摧毁伊朗核能力的行动，这加剧了人们对中东冲突扩大的担忧。【原文：Gold rose toward a record on Monday, as Israel signaled no letup in its campaign to destroy Iran’s nuclear capabilities, fueling concerns of a widening conflict in the Middle East.】

item.title: 中国政府寻求刺激出口，人民币兑美元汇率可能扩大跌幅
item.description: 在全球贸易动荡之际，中国希望促进出口，这意味着人民币现在看来将对大多数主要货币走软。美元可能是个例外。【原文：China’s desire to boost exports at a time of global trade turmoil means the yuan now looks set to weaken against most major currencies. One possible exception: the dollar.】

item.title: 以色列与伊朗冲突引发供应担忧，石油涨势延续
item.description: 本周初，以色列和伊朗在周末继续袭击对方领土，引发了人们对局势升级可能破坏中东原油供应的担忧，石油市场随之跳水。【原文：Oil jumped at the start of the week after Israel and Iran continued attacks on one another’s territories over the weekend, raising concerns an escalation could disrupt crude supply from the Middle East.】

item.title: 以色列以伊朗能源资产为目标的袭击导致石油价格暴涨
item.description: 以色列对伊朗能源资产的打击加剧了中东能源供应的风险，石油随之飙升。【原文：Oil soared after Israeli strikes on Iranian energy assets heightened the risk to Middle East supplies.】

item.title: 习近平访问哈萨克斯坦，将全球影响力推向中亚
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平将前往哈萨克斯坦与中亚领导人举行会谈，通过访问这个处于从华盛顿到北京的利益冲突中心的广大地区，与七国集团峰会形成对立。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping is heading to Kazakhstan for talks with Central Asian leaders, providing a counterpoint to a Group of Seven summit by visiting a vast region at the nexus of competing interests from Washington to Beijing.】

item.title: 新世界面临关键考验，周一将支付债券利息
item.description: 新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Co.【原文：New World Development Co., the distressed Hong Kong developer that’s unsettled investors by delaying some debt payments, faces a critical test Monday when interest comes due on a dollar bond.】

item.title: 美联储按兵不动让华尔街问降息需要什么条件
item.description: 随着美联储官员发出延长维持利率不变的信号，投资者和经济学家本周将从主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）身上寻找线索，了解哪些因素可能最终促使央行采取行动，以及何时采取行动。【原文：With Federal Reserve officials signaling an extended hold on interest rates, investors and economists will look to Chair Jerome Powell this week for clues on what might eventually prompt the central bank to make a move, and when.】

item.title: 债券投资者期待美联储就降息时机提供指导
item.description: 受唐纳德-特朗普总统贸易和财政政策影响的国债投资者本周将拭目以待美联储利率政策的影响。【原文：Treasuries investors whipsawed by President Donald Trump’s trade and fiscal policies will this week glimpse the impact on the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate policy.】

item.title: 路透社称美国进出口银行可能为格陵兰稀土矿提供资金
item.description: 据路透社周日援引一封意向书报道，美国进出口银行正在考虑为格陵兰关键金属公司（Critical Metals Corp.【原文：The US Export-Import Bank is considering providing up to $120 million for a rare earths project by Critical Metals Corp. in Greenland, Reuters reported Sunday, citing a letter of interest.】

item.title: 渔业和农业萎缩，秘鲁经济增长逊于预期
item.description: 受渔业和农业增长缓慢的拖累，秘鲁 4 月份的经济增长低于预期。【原文：Peru’s economic growth was weaker than expected in April, dragged down by slow growth in fishing and agriculture.】

item.title: 伊朗危机危及供应，石油交易商准备应对动荡
item.description: 以色列对伊朗能源资产的打击加剧了中东供应的风险，石油观察家们正准备迎接油价的进一步反弹。【原文：Oil-watchers are bracing for a further price rally after Israeli strikes on Iranian energy assets heightened the risk to Middle East supplies.】

item.title: 匈牙利提名帕洛泰为央行副行长
item.description: 匈牙利提名丹尼尔-帕罗泰（Daniel Palotai）担任央行第四副行长，该职位是在议会通过对央行领导层的全面改革后于本月设立的。【原文：Hungary nominated Daniel Palotai to become the fourth deputy governor of the central bank, a position created this month after Parliament passed an overhaul of the institution’s leadership.】

item.title: 前瑞士信贷投资银行家 Ringer 加入德国 PE 基金
item.description: 前瑞士信贷投资银行家约阿希姆-林格（Joachim Ringer）将作为合伙人加入德国专注于中型企业的私募股权公司 Vorsprung Management。【原文：Former Credit Suisse investment banker Joachim Ringer is joining German mid-cap focused private equity firm Vorsprung Management as a partner.】

item.title: 尼日利亚丹格特炼油厂为营销商提供信贷服务
item.description: 尼日利亚亿万富翁阿里科-丹格特（Aliko Dangote）的日产量达 65 万桶的工厂周日表示，现在将向一些经销商提供信贷服务，以增加非洲人口最多国家的供应。【原文：Nigerian billionaire Aliko Dangote’s 650,000-barrel-a-day plant said on Sunday it will now offer a credit facility to some dealers in an effort to boost supply in Africa’s most populous country.】

item.title: 以色列与伊朗冲突加剧加剧地缘政治市场风险
item.description: 金融市场将于周一重新开市，投资者将把注意力集中在不断升级的地缘政治紧张局势上，因为以色列和伊朗继续互相轰炸，没有暂停的迹象。【原文：Financial markets are set to reopen Monday with investors squarely focused on escalating geopolitical tensions as Israel and Iran continue to bombard each other with no sign of a pause.】

item.title: 地缘政治风险升温，交易员投身期权市场
item.description: 以色列对伊朗的空袭以及随后伊斯兰共和国的报复行动在周五的市场上掀起了波澜，促使交易商们纷纷买入期权以寻求保护。【原文：Israel’s air strikes on Iran, followed by the Islamic Republic’s retaliation, rippled through markets Friday, prompting traders to pile into options for protection.】

item.title: 交易员 "绷紧神经 "应对新兴市场的颠簸反弹
item.description: 即使关税威胁和地缘政治紧张局势升级预示着前路坎坷，投资者仍在押注新兴市场长达数月的反弹仍将继续。【原文：Investors are betting the months-long rally in emerging markets has further to run even as tariff threats and escalating geopolitical tensions signal a rocky path ahead.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行将在七月会议上决定是否公布未归属投票结果
item.description: 澳大利亚政府发言人表示，澳大利亚央行将在 7 月份的会议上决定是否公布新货币政策委员会成员的未归属投票。【原文：Australia’s central bank will decide at its July meeting whether to publish the unattributed votes of members of its new monetary policy board, according to a government spokesperson.】

item.title: 苹果对 CarPlay、iPad 和 Vision Pro 的升级让液态玻璃更出众
item.description: 苹果公司发布的 iOS 26 和 Liquid Glass 界面是其开发者大会上讨论最多的部分，但真正的亮点是其对 CarPlay、Vision Pro 和 iPad 的改进。此外还有被推迟的 Siri 升级现在定于明年春季进行；苹果公司的人工智能主管在 WWDC 上低调行事；苹果公司与 OpenAI 关系更加亲密。【原文：Apple’s unveiling of iOS 26 and the Liquid Glass interface was the most discussed part of its developers conference, but the real gems were its enhancements to CarPlay, the Vision Pro and the iPad. Also: Delayed Siri upgrades are now targeted for next spring; Apple’s AI chief lies low at WWDC; and the company gets cozier with OpenAI.】

item.title: 中东冲突加剧重创埃及英镑和股市
item.description: 由于以色列和伊朗之间的冲突不断升级，加剧了人们对更广泛地区战争的担忧，埃及英镑走软，股市也创下五年来最大跌幅。【原文：Egypt’s pound weakened and its stock market plunged the most in five years as the escalating conflict between Israel and Iran stoked fears of a wider regional war.】

item.title: 共和国报》称 Mediobanca 可能推迟对通用银行收购案的投票
item.description: 据《共和国报》（La Repubblica）报道，Mediobanca 周日召开董事会，决定是否推迟召开投资者会议，以批准其收购 Banca Generali SpA 的计划，但未提及从何处获得的信息。【原文：Mediobanca called a board meeting on Sunday to decide whether to postpone an investor meeting to endorse its plan to takeover Banca Generali SpA, La Repubblica reports, without mentioning where it obtained the information.】

item.title: 中东冲突加剧，以色列和沙特股市下跌
item.description: 本雅明-内塔尼亚胡总理的政府开始对伊朗实施空袭后，以色列股市在上市首日下跌。沙特阿拉伯的股票基准下滑，因为该地区担心会发生更广泛的冲突。【原文：Israeli stocks dropped on their first day of trading after Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s government began airstrikes against Iran. Saudi Arabia’s equity benchmark slid as concerns of a wider conflict gripped the region.】

item.title: 英国电信首席执行官称人工智能的进步可能会加剧裁员：英国金融时报
item.description: 英国电信集团首席执行官艾莉森-柯克比（Allison Kirkby）在接受《金融时报》采访时表示，人工智能的进步可能会加深电信公司已经发生的裁员。【原文：BT Group Plc CEO Allison Kirkby says that advancements in artificial intelligence could deepen the job cuts that are already happening at the telecommunications firm in an interview with the Financial Times.】
